description: These savoury Italian-inspired muffins are as satisfying as they are delicious. Lean beef mince, herbs, cheese and quinoa combine for a snack in a snap.
name: Cheesy Beef & Quinoa Muffins Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids light meal & snack,Fresh Food Kids
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Spray a 12-hole, 1/3-cup capacity muffin pan with oil. Place onion and carrot in a clean tea towel and squeeze out excess moisture. Transfer to a large bowl.

Add beef, quinoa, garlic, parsley, egg and 1 cup passata to bowl and mix well to combine. Season with pepper. Divide beef mixture among pan holes. Top evenly with remaining passata. Sprinkle with cheese and dried herbs.
Bake for 25 minutes or until cheese is golden and beef is cooked through. Stand in pan for 10 minutes to allow muffins to firm up slightly, then serve.
